name: Music_1931.wav
keywords: ['amateur recording', 'acoustic guitar', 'male voice', 'shaker', 'violin', 'folk song', 'romantic feel', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This folk song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by an acoustic guitar. A shaker plays in place of the percussion. Violins play a melody in the background. The mood of this song is romantic. This song can be played in a flashback scene of a movie.
